summary: the custom-built boeing 747 is believed to have cost its ultra-wealthy owner # 400million after it was customised to fit his specifications exactly over a three-year period . the jumbo jet would normally carry as many as 600 passengers - but this version was built for just a single tycoon , although he will be able to fit dozens of guests . it contains a large dining room where travellers can enjoy meals cooked in an adjoining kitchen , with a lounge and ` state room ' at the back of the plane .

aspect: 1. Mystery billionaire bought a custom-built Boeing 747 for £400million.
2. It has a dining room, lounge, state room, sleeping space, and conference room.
3. It's like a luxury hotel in the sky.
4. The owner can relax in the master bedroom with a huge bed.
5. The plane can carry dozens of guests for meetings in the sky.
6. It has a private chef and is one of the most luxurious private planes ever built.
7. The owner can switch between work and relaxation in the state room.
explain: The aspect states that a mystery billionaire purchased a custom-built Boeing 747 for £400million.
The custom-built 747 has a dining room, lounge, state room, sleeping accommodations, and a conference room.

This aspect is referring to the custom-made luxury Boeing 747, which is fit for only one tycoon. The description of the plane includes a large dining room, an adjoining kitchen, a lounge, and a state room at the back of the plane. So, It's like a luxury hotel in the sky because the plane is specially made for one person and includes all the luxurious amenities of a hotel, such as fine dining and comfortable spaces to relax.
The aspect states that the owner of the custom-built Boeing 747 has a master bedroom with a huge bed, where they can relax on board.

The aspect states that the custom-built Boeing 747 is designed to carry dozens of guests for meetings in the sky. This means that the plane has been customized to accommodate a large number of people in addition to the owner, allowing them to conduct business or hold meetings while in flight.

The aspect highlights the luxurious features of the custom-built Boeing 747, which includes a private chef. Being one of the most luxurious private planes ever built, it has been customized to fit the specifications of a single tycoon. The plane contains a large dining room where guests can enjoy meals cooked in an adjoining kitchen, along with a lounge and "state room" at the back of the plane. Having a private chef in a luxurious private plane adds to the overall experience and confirms the aspect of the plane being one of the most luxurious ever built.

The aspect states that the owner of the custom-built 747 aircraft can switch between work and relaxation in the state room, which is located at the back of the plane. This means that the owner has a separate area where they can work and conduct business without being disturbed while travelling. Additionally, they can also relax and unwind in the same room, making it a versatile space that allows for both productivity and leisure.
